content.title: What do we do?
content.description:
In the era of the web and social media, local businesses struggle to keep on top and attract new customers. People typically go online to find the best price before walking down the high street.

We at Digital Thunder think that the local business owner can make the most of the times with a strong online presence, and we want to help!

The services we offer include beautifully designed websites and branding, digital and physical advertising as well as social media marketing. We can simply create the content you need and you can manage it in your own way, alternatively, we offer continuous management of your online presence. We leave those decisions up to you, but we're here to help.

content.title: Web design & development
content.description: We build a beautiful websites, which are accessible on devices of all shapes and sizes. You could have a basic platform for advertising your services to a portfolio, blogs or e-commerce site. Get in touch to find out what we can do for you!

content.title: Graphics and branding
content.description: Eye catching visuals are an important part of your brand. At Digital Thunder we can help give your business a fresh lick of paint with modern logo and graphic design services.

content.title: Advertising
content.description: Posters, flyers and business cards need to be sharp and sleek, demanding attention! Modernise your content with professional consultancy, design and production from Digital Thunder.

content.title: Bespoke design
content.description: We offer a custom design service for pretty much anything you could need. Maybe you need help designing a new advertising board, store sign, wedding invitations, birthday banners or party t-shirts. Just send us your ideas or inspiration and we can make it happen.
